Player History
Was selected to the 1965 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1967, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1967, hitting .383 with 5 HR, 28 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1967...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Cincinnati on 8/10/1969...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 9/1/1969...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1969, hitting .379 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1970, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/25/1971, off Nolan Ryan (HOU)...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pittsburgh, driving in 4 runs on 8/4/1971...
Hit for the cycle against Chicago (N) on 5/14/1973...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/12/1976 to a 1-year deal worth $3,751,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/7/1977 to a 2-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
